abstract: The URL’s resource data, as an asynchronous sequence of bytes.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this property with Swift’s `for`-`await`-`in` syntax, to read the contents of a URL byte-by-byte, like this:

To wait for the entire resource to load, use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/data(from:delegate:)] with the `await` keyword. [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] also offers methods to upload data to a URL endpoint and download a URL’s contents to a file.

items.description: The URL’s resource data, as an asynchronous sequence of lines of text.
items.name: lines

items.description: An asynchronous sequence of bytes loaded from the URL.
items.name: URL.AsyncBytes

title: resourceBytes
